sentence_data`: Scientists were working for 12-18 hours at Thumba.

The boss consented.

'A frog croaked all night in a bog
One night a nightingale began to sing in a melodious voice.
All the creatures in the bog cheered and clapped at her beautiful song. So the frog could sing unrivalled in the bog once more.
'Soon the nightingale became famous
sentence_type_id`: and creatures from miles around came to \r\nhear her sing.'

sentence_data`: The next night the frog introduced himself.

sentence_data`: ''So the frog and the nightingale journeyed up and down the scale''. This line refers to the high and low notes of a musical scale.
The frog says that the nightingale was ''far too prone to influence''. This statement is \r\nironical because it was the frog who was prone to influence
The nightingale became morose because the ticket office had crashed.
In the line ''You must aim for better billing'
sentence_type_id`: billing refers to clearing the debts of the nightingale.'

sentence_data`: The ''joy was both sweet and bitter''. It was sweet for the frog because he was earning a lot of money.
The ''joy was both sweet and bitter''. It was bitter for the frog because  he was jealous of the nightingale.
